General.Name: Rockhaven Resources Ltd
General.Description: Rockhaven Resources Ltd., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties in Canada. It primarily explores for precious and base metal deposits. The company holds a 100% interest in the Klaza gold-silver property that includes 1,478 mineral claims covering an area of 287 square kilometers located in the Whitehorse mining district, Yukon Territory. Rockhaven Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1100 Melville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4A6
